idea: They are very less one-stop home interior service to homeowners across India at present. This is where we want to step in and we are solving the problems like the stress of finding quality materials, well-qualified vendors from the unorganized market with Transparent pricing, lots of visits to market for selection of materials/products which causes the chaotic situation and also problem like inappropriate visualization which can cause rework.

idea: Customers love good service, but the hospitality industry must also provide quality products to satisfy customers. Goals based on this important objective vary from restaurant to restaurant and from hotel to hotel. Patrons of a restaurant demand fresh, delicious food. Customers also desire consistency. They want a cheeseburger from a fast food chain to taste the same in San Francisco as it does in their hometown. Hotel guests look for quiet, clean and comfortable rooms where they can get a good night's sleep and spotless, spa-like bathrooms.
name: STANVEE HOSPITALITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SS Microtech offers its customers a complete range of filtration systems and products provides multidisciplinary technical consulting.

For nearly three decades SS Microtech has been a leading provider of custom made filter bags and transfer sleeves for the Food, Wood, Chemical and Mineral Industries.

SSMPL began by designing and fabricating unique cloth filter bags and transfer sleeves for the diverse assortment of equipment found in food processing plants across the India and Overseas. From there SSMPL morphed into a provider for all types filtration products, Cartridge Filter housing, and other Liquid Filtration Products.

As SSMPL ability to make high quality NAS/Superclean Oil Filtration System one-of-a-kind specialty products became known throughout these industries demand increased and the company took the shape of what it is today. SSMPL has a staff of experienced technical sales designers working closely with its custom manufacturing facilities, and a network of sources to integrate many hard-to-find items. SSMPL welcomes every opportunity to solve their customer’s challenges.
name: SS MICROTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
